Text:
Two students stand on the roof in the early summer.
One is an attractive girl with silvery-white hair and
the other is an ordinary boy with black hair.

This incident has been resolved on the surface, but I
can sense something brewing behind the scenes.

Iris is preparing to dispatch a special brigade, and
I plan to help her. So we're only just getting
started.
Really, you don't say.
Well, I'm off then—
Wait!
Um... There's something I have to tell you.
Here?
Here.

You said you liked my swordsmanship, right? Well, I
know I'm late, but I really appreciate it.
No problem.

I finally like it. Not that I attribute that
development to you.
Did you really have to throw in that last bit?
It's the truth.
They lock eyes.

Anyway, if you've learned to like your swordplay,
that sounds good to me.
Yeah, it is.
The girl smiles.
Well, I'm off then—
Wait!
Well...we've pretended to date until now,
...but Instructor Zenon died in that incident...

The girl looks uncomfortable as she searches for the
right words.
If you're all right with it...
Her red eyes dart around.
Maybe we can do this a little while longer?
Her voice softens ever so slightly.
The boy beams at her.
No thanks.
He answers, giving a thumbs-down.
The girl unsheathes her sword in one fluid motion.

(That night, a student discovers a large pool of
blood on the rooftop.)

(Despite this, there's no corpse in the vicinity.
Even when the students and school authorities
investigate the matter, there are no wounded or
missing persons.)

(Subsequently, this is dubbed the Incident of the
Corpseless Murder and considered one of the seven
wonders of the school.)
Beta, report.

Master Shadow destroyed the Cult facility where
Princess Alexia was held captive, and he vaporized
Zenon Griffey, leaving no trace.
Boss man is the strongest!
It was the most magnificent light...

The entire capital was tinged with Master Shadow's
magic...creating what I can only describe as a
celestial paradise.

Indeed, I'm sure they fully realize now that they are
nothing more than prey to be hunted down.

Eventually, the day will come when all our enemies 
will vanish into that light—

A silence of anticipation descends on the room
momentarily.
Shall we continue?
Yes.

Zeta appears to have found the target. She intends to
make contact and move to investigate.
Let's wait for good news.
Here is Eta's research report.
Everything seems to be going according to plan.
Finally, there is an urgent matter—
You mean this here.

Those fools who impersonated us seem to have
successfully hidden their tracks...
They can run, but they can't hide.

The Cult of Diablos, the Shadow Garden... Things
appear to be happening behind the scenes that are
beyond our understanding.
However—
You distrust the Knight Order?

One of our country's renowned sword instructors was
a follower of this Cult of Diablos. If that doesn't
give you pause...
So, will we move according to plan?
Yes, I will establish a special brigade.
Glen, Marco.

I'd like to recruit the two of you, who I
wholeheartedly trust.
I'm at your command.
I-It will be my honor!
Thank you.
For now, this is our only clue...

We must first find someone who can decipher its
function.
//ムービー再生
